        public AdSystemControl(int gbSystemControlId,
                       String gbSystemPause,
                       String gbSystemWorkDay,
                       Date gbLastCloseDt,
                       Date gbNextCloseDt,
                       Date createDt,
                       int rowversion)
        Create a new instance of System control with following parameters:
        Parameters:
        gbSystemControlId - unique id of control.
        gbSystemPause - flag system pause.
        gbSystemWorkDay - flag working day.
        gbLastCloseDt - date of last close system.
        gbNextCloseDt - date of next close system.
        createDt - date of create this entry.
        rowversion - entry version.
